title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 567.6 - Nomination process
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 567.6 - Nomination process

State Regulations
(a) Nominations
will be made during a specific time period and decisions regarding award
recipients made in a timely fashion. GOER program guidelines will specify a
time period for submission of nominations. (b) Nominations of employees may be made by
supervisors, colleagues or subordinates from within an agency, or by State
employees of another agency. Nominators need not be M/C's. Individuals may also
nominate themselves. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
567.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
